text:
Vice (Official Trailer)

The story of Dick Cheney, the most powerful Vice President in history, and how his policies changed the world as we know it.
title: How Christian Bale fattened up to play Dick Cheney in ‘Vice’ movie

twitter.title: Christian Bale looks just like Dick Cheney in ‘Vice.’ Here’s how he pigged out to do it
twitter.description: Actor Christian Bale gained more than 40 pounds for his role as former Vice President Dick Cheney in the 2018 film “Vice,” which also stars Amy Adams (as Lynne Cheney), Steve Carell, Tyler Perry and Sam Rockwell.
